intro: Platytaenia diversifolia, commonly known as the diverse-leaf platytaenia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive, often lobed leaves that vary in shape and size across different parts of the plant. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pale green or yellow in color. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is often found in moist, shaded environments. Due to its unique foliage, it is occasionally cultivated as an ornamental plant.
